body:
I am Chinese so I read the Kanji part so whatever. 
There are two human-like races in the world. The hero and heroine are futanari before adolescence. During the war the heroine was kidnapped and the enemy race commited some experiment on her to find out about sex differentiation. The hero became a soldier and found this video tape at a institution.
can't read Japanese but why do I have a feeling this is a sad story
I don’t hate things like this but use adult females, don’t use kids. I’m all for lolis depending how they look but this is weirder then just lolis
I don't get it at all, what the fuck they sayin? The art is enjoyable tho
